page.title: 20THIRD YEAR-TAKING OPTIONS
page.content: When you go into the Third Year you take the same subjects as in the previous year. However, early in this year you are expected to choose your options. This takes place in the second half of the Christmas term. There are four compulsory subjects in the fourth year- Maths,English, Games and P.E.G.S."PEGS" is a non-exam subject and we deal with a variety of topics during that time. You can then choose six options but at least one of these must be a science and another must be a language. By the end of the Spring term options are fixed so that your timetable can be sorted out. At the end of the Summer term exams are taken and these help to decide whether you take your options at "O"level or "C.S.E." BY FIONA DAVIS 4K3
